name: RT 01 Meeting
desc: Regular meeting of RT 01 residents to discuss various needs and local management, including activity planning and problem-solving.

name: RT 02 Meeting
desc: Discussion among RT 02 residents to share aspirations, evaluate work programs, and strengthen cooperation for neighborhood comfort.

name: RW 20 Meeting
desc: Communication forum between RT representatives at the RW level to align work programs, discuss strategic issues, and determine joint development steps.

name: PKK Activities RT 01
desc: Activities involving RT 01 mothers to enhance family welfare, such as skill training, food management, and social activities.

name: PKK Activities RT 02
desc: PKK programs in RT 02 focusing on empowering women in households, including economic management and environmental health.

name: Village PKK Activities
desc: Collective agenda of mothers from all RTs under the RW umbrella to strengthen synergy and implement larger-scale welfare programs.

name: Integrated Health Service
desc: Integrated health services focusing on infants, toddlers, and the elderly, including health check-ups, immunizations, and nutrition education.

name: Youth Meeting
desc: Discussion forum among village youths to plan and evaluate work programs while strengthening solidarity through social and cultural activities.

name: Qur'an Learning Center
desc: Activities for children to learn reading, writing, and understanding the Qur'an, aiming to instill religious values from an early age.

name: Religious Gathering
desc: Regular religious event involving residents to deepen religious knowledge, strengthen community ties, and fortify faith.

name: Regular Exercise
desc: Weekly exercise activities open to all village residents to enhance fitness and maintain collective health.
